>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/workflows/runs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a list of workflow runs with optional filtering by status, result, workflow, and more.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":0,"maximum":1000},"in":"query","name":"limit","description":"Maximum number of workflow runs to return.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":9007199254740991},"in":"query","name":"offset","description":"Number of workflow runs to skip for pagination.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","pattern":"^wfr_[a-zA-Z0-9]{16}$"}},"in":"query","name":"workflowRunIdentifiers","description":"Filter by specific workflow run identifiers.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"in":"query","name":"workflowIdentifiers","description":"Filter by workflow identifiers.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"example":1,"type":"integer","exclusiveMinimum":0,"maximum":9007199254740991}},"in":"query","name":"workflowVersions","description":"Filter by workflow versions.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"createdBy","description":"Filter by the user who created the workflow run.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["COMPLETED","IN_PROGRESS"]}},"in":"query","name":"statuses","description":"Filter by workflow run statuses.","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","enum":["CANCELLED","SUCCESS","FAILED"]}},"in":"query","name":"results","description":"Filter by workflow run results.","required":false}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
